resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Warning: Do not use your main account. Please create an alternative. By using this service, you agree that we cannot be held responsible for any consequences to your account.
Disclaimer: PokeMap for Pokemon Go is not associated, affiliated, endorsed, sponsored or approved by Niantic, Nintendo, or Pokemon Company.

Version 1.1 - 7/23/16


 Search algorithm is more efficient.

 Search speed is much faster.

 You can now switch between searching your location and searching where the map is looking. To switch, press the button at the top left corner of the map.

 The map will stop showing Pokemon if you are zoomed too far out, to prevent the device from slowing down.
